name: Part Pacifist
description:
This is a prototype for Utah Indie Game Jam 2017 https://itch.io/jam/utah-indie-game-jam-2017 

Built in Unity and using SteamVR for an HTC Vive setup.

There are no teleporting mechanics, yet you walk through several rooms, using the Compartmented Traversal design. Large room scale is required. This prototype uses the theme Pacifist in the ending where you decide what to do with a gun. 

CREDITS
Josh Jones - Scripting, Production, Design
Jeff Warren - Scripting, Level Design
Christopher Escalante - Audio/SFX
Kenneth Cobble - Music/Mad Sax Skills

Repo: https://github.com/vazor222/PartPacifist
